name: Frenzy Red Ball: Knife Escape
description:
Frenzy Red Ball!
Red is not a sign of Alert!
Why everyone thins Red ball is a sign of danger? it's frenzy here for you Entertainment.
Come Along this Red Ball and have a Fun of some adorable places... but Be aware of some Hurdles.. Spikes, Shapes , knife , Woody Blocks ,
If Knife Hit You Or You smash with woody Box.. You will Lost Your Red Ball. You will have to escape from All these Shapes to keep Your Red Ball safe.

Roll, jump and bounce through endless exciting level full of adventure.
Make your way through tricky traps and defeat all Spikes.
Pass each Knife depends on your skill and intelligence.

How to Play Red Ball :
- Tap The Screen when Spikes are not in Your way...If you Hit the Spikes You are Lost... Knife Hit you from anywhere
- Hold The Screen for long Jump
- Shape Escape , Knife Hit and Smash Hit are most probably the dangers from which you have to be aware.
- Roll The ball..The Hooper Ball from One platform to other.
- Go through Different Scenes As The Game Progress.
- Dodge the Boxes and Knife
- Physics-based Dash platforming


So , Download this amazing Frenzy Red Ball and Enjoy.

If you have any suggestions or ideas for the game - Let Us inform.


If You Like the Game don’t forget to give us a good review.
